translations: 建在高处的房子；（鹰等鸟类的）巢（aery 的复数）

sentences.sentence: The parameters in the aeries include: amount of longitudinal reinforcement, amount of transverse reinforcement, shear span-to-depth ratio, thickness of tube wall and strength of concrete.
sentences.translation: 试验中的主要参数有：纵向钢筋的数量、横向配筋率、剪跨比、管壁的厚度及混凝土强度。
